name: Trespasser (itch)
description:
You're far from home, in the dark, barraged by rain and thunder, and worst of all, alone. You have to find your way home despite all this, avoiding the wood's many terrors.

Controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Hold space to run/restart when dead.
Controller is supported (click in the game window if it doesn't pick it up)

Please note that we do not advice hiding under trees in the event of a real thunderstorm (https://www.wikihow.com/Avoid-Getting-Hit-by-Lightning).

Made for Ludum Dare 51 in the Jam category with the theme "Every 10 Seconds".
